title: mikeholmes7
author: mikeholmes7
content: it is going on 10000x .lets play for higher returns www.thearmor.io

comments.author: KennyR
comments.body: The URL provided isn't secure and it looks like self made platform. There were more trusted gambling platforms providing the best crash game. Good is to stay away from such attempts of new platforms that are not secure and doesn't have a perfect process of development and promotion.

comments.author: Note3
comments.body: This is not a good thing to introduce gambling websites, to be difficult for members to glance at your gambling site with such poor an introduction.What is the difference between crash games from other  gambling websites? I am sure that it will be the same, just the graphics  difference.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: If it were a site that had just launched, I would be impressed by how I could see the number of bitcoins already won by some people at the bottom of the site. Few people would spend so much on a new casino site on bitcoin gambling.And seeing your site's registration time, 2022-06-29, makes me suspicious of the number of bitcoins already on your site. But I don't know.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on October 07, 2022, 04:31:40 AMThe URL provided isn't secure and it looks like self made platform. There were more trusted gambling platforms providing the best crash game. Good is to stay away from such attempts of new platforms that are not secure and doesn't have a perfect process of development and promotion.The site started with https, the s means it has SSL or TLS certificate, and it means it is secure. But it could likely be a self-made one and able to to scam people just like fake gambling site. All of the fake sites that belongs to scammers these days have SSL or TLS certificate and are secure, but they can be used to scam and this likely might be another one of them. As for me, the site do not have any qualification that I can use to recommend it than being a scam site that people should avoid.Quote from: michellee on October 07, 2022, 06:09:33 AMIf it were a site that had just launched, I would be impressed by how I could see the number of bitcoins already won by some people at the bottom of the site. Few people would spend so much on a new casino site on bitcoin gambling.And seeing your site's registration time, 2022-06-29, makes me suspicious of the number of bitcoins already on your site. But I don't know.You are funny, it is their site, all the money won could be fake. Most likely fake.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: The site did load, but for me it was a bit sluggish and slow.... and I cannot really say if it was any different to any other "Crash" type game that I played on any of the other sites where they host these types of games. People entering the casino scene, cannot just "Copy&Paste" crash themed games and expect loads of people to join it, there are too much competition out there. They must come up with unique new concepts to break into this tough market.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Kakmakr on October 07, 2022, 06:38:15 AMThe site did load, but for me it was a bit sluggish and slow.... and I cannot really say if it was any different to any other "Crash" type game that I played on any of the other sites where they host these types of games.I registered to check their website out. the crash game is pretty much the same compared to other gambling sites. if anyone is looking for a gambling site to play crash, I suggest avoiding this website since there are much better and more reputable gambling sites out there that have crash games.

comments.author: mikeholmes7
comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on October 07, 2022, 04:31:40 AMThe URL provided isn't secure and it looks like self made platform. There were more trusted gambling platforms providing the best crash game. Good is to stay away from such attempts of new platforms that are not secure and doesn't have a perfect process of development and promotion.I am not paid promoter, I made a good profit from this game so I shared it with the community, and not any other game gives that much profit it's going to 10000x sometimes and 1000x is very normal in this game.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 07:09:22 AMI am not paid promoter, I made a good profit from this game so I shared it with the community, You are indeed the promoter of the site. Whether you get paid for it or not, that's your business. As far as we know, you can be the owner of the site.Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 07:09:22 AMand not any other game gives that much profit it's going to 10000x sometimes and 1000x is very normal in this game.That's a very bold statement, do you have any evidence for that? Is your game even provably fair?

comments.body: Quote from: KennyR on October 07, 2022, 04:31:40 AMThe URL provided isn't secure and it looks like self made platform. There were more trusted gambling platforms providing the best crash game. Good is to stay away from such attempts of new platforms that are not secure and doesn't have a perfect process of development and promotion.Maybe you're seeing it wrong, because I saw this site verified by Let's Encrypt, which Let's Encrypt is quite well known and trusted.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 04:09:34 AMit is going on 10000x .lets play for higher returns www.thearmor.ioI just created an account and saw what was interesting to test the game there, but I'm still curious about the front page of the website whether it's the correct bet amount of around 19 BTC, it looks big or just the homepage display, but let's take a look at the website you and test it

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 04:09:34 AMit is going on 10000x .lets play for higher returns www.thearmor.ioFor me, when I try to register, I get an error message about the "SQLSTATE database[HY000] [2002] Connection refused", which is extremely rare, of course, I tried it in various browsers, but I never got a positive result, I don't even know what it might be related to.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. First things first you didn't have a good introduction and as far as I can see about the site, it's not that bad but the record or let me call it the data about bet is the same from 1x to 3x and the bettors are all in order which makes me getting suspicious about the site. After some checking, didn't see any terms and conditions, rules and regulations or even the FAQ of the site. Not that I am saying that the site is a scam but it is better to be safe than sorry. As stated in previous post that even a scam site have ssl or tsl certificate that the site is secured as I have created a thread about ssl vs tsl with sources.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 07:09:22 AMI am not paid promoter, I made a good profit from this game so I shared it with the community, and not any other game gives that much profit it's going to 10000x sometimes and 1000x is very normal in this game.1000x very normal?  Come on man... we are smart enough in this forum to know that kind multiplier is something hard to get... If you're suggesting people to play into this site I think you have to not make such kind of claims because these are definitely impossible  plus this is a brand new site, it's not easy to trust at first glance and I think it should be better see some withdrawals or much better some official topic with official representative

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, but a lot of things is not right with your service. Just like others who have commented have said, I advise other members of the forum to be careful with this casino until otherwise because there seems to be a lot of security issues with this site and it can become a scam if care is not taken. I will keep watching this thread to see if there is going to be any improvement in the future.

comments.body: Quote from: bitbollo on October 07, 2022, 07:19:07 PMQuote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 07:09:22 AMI am not paid promoter, I made a good profit from this game so I shared it with the community, and not any other game gives that much profit it's going to 10000x sometimes and 1000x is very normal in this game.1000x very normal?  Come on man... we are smart enough in this forum to know that kind multiplier is something hard to get... If you're suggesting people to play into this site I think you have to not make such kind of claims because these are definitely impossible  plus this is a brand new site, it's not easy to trust at first glance and I think it should be better see some withdrawals or much better some official topic with official representative Also, im bit familiar with the design.I had just forgotten the name but im much sure that it does have on the same registration box plus into that image design and templates that had been used but its not namedthearmore, which basically means that this one had copied out the design and just offering a crash game which they had made out those words on having x1000 hit is easy? Whose fool would really be buying on that?He might believe that there are lots of fools who do really believe on easy money making or profits on gambling space.People on this forum arent that dumb. hehe

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: You don't have any terms and conditions, privacy policy for your casino game? I think it's important to know what are the grounds the player are into and what they are sharing here especially data privacy kind of stuff. I can only see two usernames there but their avatar are clearly not the same, was that only an example?

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: rhomelmabini on October 07, 2022, 08:01:00 PMYou don't have any terms and conditions, privacy policy for your casino game? I think it's important to know what are the grounds the player are into and what they are sharing here especially data privacy kind of stuff. I can only see two usernames there but their avatar are clearly not the same, was that only an example?This is what I was looking for also. Because you need at least the terms and conditions, so every player knows what to comply.Because if not, no reference is found if someone got any issue, and they don't know what to do.The casino also can confiscate the funds from the player without any reference of their violation because they don't have the list.If the OP won big here, well, we can't say if he is just promoting their site or he is indeed a player on this site. For now, it is better to take precautions as they have important features lacking.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: mikeholmes7 on October 07, 2022, 04:09:34 AMit is going on 10000x .lets play for higher returns www.thearmor.ioThe site looks good when it comes to graphic design but I’m also wondering if the numbers are real and is this a licensed site? There’s a lot of missing information on the site and many are looking for the terms and conditions, this is very important on any site. Actually this thread can be more better if you will elaborate and highlights the features of this site, gambler will only try this site if they are able to get the information they are looking for.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Not the kind of gambling site that I will trust right away, there are no terms or privacy policy pages and no FAQ either I know many of us here know how to play crash but how about new ones who are not familiar with playing Crash, even the announcement thread is very bland, OP lack unprofessionalism and people will doubt if he is the owner or even the official representative of this crash game site.I have this feeling that he will just drop the link and then will not be active here for all we know he was just hired to post this project here, so I consider this site risky to play for now.
